TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OperationBehaviorAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class OperationBehaviorAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IOperationBehavior
public ref class OperationBehaviorAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IOperationBehavior
type OperationBehaviorAttribute = class inherit Attribute interface IOperationBehavior

summary.span: 指定服務方法的本機執行行為。

span.span: Specifies the local execution behavior of a service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性，即可指出作業在執行時會具有何種作業特定的執行行為 Use the attribute to indicate what operation-specific execution behavior the operation has when executed. (如果要指定服務等級的執行行為，請使用 屬性)。(To specify execution behavior at the service level, use the attribute.) > [!NOTE] > 您也可以使用 ，設定在雙工用戶端應用程式中的回呼合約作業。You can also use to configure a callback contract operation in a duplex client application. 使用於回呼作業時， 屬性必須是 ，否則 會在執行階段擲回例外狀況。When used on a callback operation, the property must be or an exception is thrown at runtime. 屬性是 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 程式撰寫模型功能，可讓開發人員必須另外實作的通用功能。The attribute is a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) programming model feature that enables common features that developers otherwise must implement themselves. - 屬性會控制傳遞至作業的參數物件是否會在作業完成時進行處置。The property controls whether parameter objects passed to an operation are disposed when the operation completes. - 屬性會指定如果沒有發生未處理的例外狀況，此方法執行於其中的交易是否會自動進行認可。The property specifies whether the transaction in which the method executes is automatically committed if no unhandled exceptions occur. - 屬性會指定方法是否必須在交易內執行。The property specifies whether a method must execute within a transaction. - 屬性會指定服務作業屬於可以、必須或無法模擬呼叫者的身分識別。The property specifies whether the service operation can, must, or cannot impersonate the caller's identity. - 屬性會指定在方法引動程序期間的哪個階段回收服務物件。The property specifies when service objects are recycled during the method invocation process. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範在強制分散式交易中執行的作業。The following code example shows an operation that executes within a mandatory distributed transaction. 屬性會指出該方法會由呼叫者的交易執行，而 屬性會指出在未發生未處理例外狀況的情況下，交易便會自動認可。The property indicates that the method executes under the caller's transaction and the property indicates that if no unhandled exceptions occur, the transaction commits automatically. 如果確實發生未處理的例外狀況，異動便會中止。If an unhandled exception does occur, the transaction is aborted. [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Transaction#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_transaction/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Transaction#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_transaction/vb/services.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式會建立包含下列預設值的類別執行個體：The default constructor creates an instance of the class with the following defaults: - 屬性為 `true`。The property is `true`. - 屬性為 `false`。The property is `false`. - 屬性為 。The property is . - 為 。The is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoDisposeParameters { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoDisposeParameters : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定是否要自動處置參數。

span.span: Gets or sets whether parameters are to be automatically disposed.

value.span: 如果要自動處置參數，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the parameters are to be automatically disposed; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會決定服務是否會在處理訊息時處置已建立的所有可處置參數 (輸入、輸出或參考參數)。This property determines whether the service disposes all disposable parameters (input, output or reference parameters) that were created while processing a message. 預設值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. 如果要防止系統處置資源並於必要時進行快取，請將這個屬性設定為 `false`。Set this property to `false` if you want to prevent the system from disposing of resources and cache them if required. 例如，如果 為 `false`，傳送者就會負責關閉傳送端的資料流。For example, if is `false`, then the sender is responsible for closing the stream on the sending side.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::ImpersonationOption Impersonation { System::ServiceModel::ImpersonationOption get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::ImpersonationOption value); };
member this.Impersonation : System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出作業支援的呼叫者模擬等級。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the level of caller impersonation that the operation supports.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性 (搭配支援模擬的繫結組態)，即可讓指定的方法 (即含有 屬性已設為 或 之標記的方法) 由呼叫者的身分識別加以執行。Use the property (together with a binding configuration that supports impersonation) to enable specified methods (those marked with the property set to or ) to execute under the caller's identity. 如需詳細資訊，包括使用時，如何執行模擬搭配屬性，請參閱[委派和模擬](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/delegation-and-impersonation-with-wcf.md)和[How to： 服務上模擬用戶端](~/docs/framework/wcf/how-to-impersonate-a-client-on-a-service.md).For details, including how impersonation is performed when using together with the property, see [Delegation and Impersonation](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/delegation-and-impersonation-with-wcf.md) and [How to: Impersonate a Client on a Service](~/docs/framework/wcf/how-to-impersonate-a-client-on-a-service.md). > [!NOTE] > 當透過程式設計方式來新增可執行模擬服務端點時，您必須使用其中一個 方法或是 方法，將合約適當地載入新的 物件中。When programmatically adding a service endpoint that performs impersonation, you must either use one of the methods or the method to properly load the contract into a new object. 使用組態檔時並不需要額外步驟。Using a configuration file requires no extra step. 有些特定的案例可能不支援模擬。There may be specific scenarios when impersonation is not supported. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[不支援的案例](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/unsupported-scenarios.md)。For more information, see [Unsupported Scenarios](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/unsupported-scenarios.md). ## Examples 下列服務程式碼範例在 屬性設定為 之後，將需要進行模擬。The following service code example requires impersonation by setting the property to . [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_impersonation/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_impersonation/vb/services.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例將示範先使用 屬性來設定用戶端應用程式認證，再叫用需要使用這些認證來進行模擬的作業。The following code example shows using the property to set the client application credentials prior to invoking the operation that requires those credentials for impersonation. [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Impersonation#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_impersonation/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Impersonation#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_impersonation/vb/client.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::ReleaseInstanceMode ReleaseInstanceMode { System::ServiceModel::ReleaseInstanceMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::ReleaseInstanceMode value); };
member this.ReleaseInstanceMode : System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出要在作業引動過程期間的哪個階段回收服務物件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates when in the course of an operation invocation to recycle the service object.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 時回收服務物件執行方法過程中的。Use the property to specify when Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) recycles a service object in the course of executing a method. 預設行為是根據 值來回收服務物件。The default behavior is to recycle a service object according to the value. 設定 屬性，便會變更該預設行為。Setting the property changes that default behavior. 不提供任何執行緒保證。The makes no threading guarantees. 如果您必須在服務執行時使用全新和未修改的物件，請將 屬性設定為 。If you must have a new, unmodified object when your service runs, set the property to . 在交易案例中， 屬性經常在處理方法呼叫之前，用於確保與服務物件有關聯的舊資料將會進行清理。In transaction scenarios, the property is often used to ensure that old data associated with the service object is cleaned up prior to processing a method call. 您也可以將 屬性設定為 `true`，以確保與交易有關聯的服務物件會在交易成功完成之後進行回收。You can also ensure that service objects associated with transactions are recycled after the transaction successfully completes by setting the property to `true`. 您可以選擇下列行為：You can choose the following behaviors: - 在呼叫作業之前回收服務物件。Recycle a service object before an operation is called. - 在呼叫作業之後回收服務物件。Recycle a service object after an operation is called. - 在呼叫作業之前和之後都回收服務物件。Recycle a service object both before and after an operation is called. - 不進行回收行為。No recycling behavior. 您也可以使用 ，設定在雙工用戶端應用程式中的回呼合約作業。You can also use to configure a callback contract operation in a duplex client application. 使用於回呼作業時， 屬性必須是 ，否則 會在執行階段擲回例外狀況。When used on a callback operation, the property must be or an exception is thrown at runtime. 此外，您務必要瞭解，如果服務是藉由將服務物件傳遞至 建構函式所建立，這個屬性的值就會以它是 的方式進行處理。In addition, it is important to realize that if the service is created by passing a service object to the constructor, the value of this property is treated as if it were . ## Examples 下列範例程式碼示範如何使用 在呼叫前後回收服務物件。The following example code shows the use of to recycle service objects both before and after a call. [!code-csharp[OBA.ReleaseInstanceMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/oba.releaseinstancemode/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OBA.ReleaseInstanceMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/oba.releaseinstancemode/vb/services.vb#1)]

exception.span: 該值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TransactionAutoComplete { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.TransactionAutoComplete : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出如果沒有發生未處理的例外狀況，是否要自動完成目前的異動範圍。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to automatically complete the current transaction scope if no unhandled exceptions occur.

value.span: 如果要在成功執行作業時自動完成交易範圍，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to complete the transaction scope automatically on successful execution of the operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將 屬性設定為 `false`，即可直接透過作業的程式碼來完成或中止交易。Set the property to `false` to complete or abort transactions directly in the code for the operation. 已處理的例外狀況可以在作業期間擲回，而不用自動中止交易。Handled exceptions can be thrown in the course of the operation without automatically aborting the transaction. 只有未處理的例外狀況才會觸發自動中止。Only unhandled exceptions trigger an automatic abort. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範在強制分散式交易中執行的作業。The following code example shows an operation that executes within a mandatory distributed transaction. 屬性會指出該作業會執行於交易範圍下，而 屬性會指出如果沒有發生未處理的例外狀況，該交易範圍便會自動完成。The property indicates that the operation executes under a transaction scope and the property indicates that if no unhandled exceptions occur, the transaction scope is completed automatically. 如果確實發生未處理的例外狀況，異動便會中止。If an unhandled exception does occur, the transaction is aborted. [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Transaction#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_transaction/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Transaction#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_transaction/vb/services.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TransactionScopeRequired { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.TransactionScopeRequired : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出該方法在執行時是否需要異動範圍。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the method requires a transaction scope for its execution.

value.span: 如果方法必須有交易範圍才可執行，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the method requires a transaction scope to execute; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將 設定為 `true`，即可要求您的作業執行於交易範圍內。Set the to `true` to require your operation to execute within a transaction scope. 如果有可用的流動交易，該作業便會在該交易內執行。If a flowed transaction is available, the operation executes within that transaction. 如果沒有可用的流動交易，這時便會建立新的交易，並於執行作業時使用。If one is not available, a new transaction is created and used for the operation execution. 端點中指定的繫結會控制是否支援流動交易。The binding specified in the endpoint controls whether flowed transactions are supported. 因此，如果要取得適當行為，您必須了解繫結和 屬性是否允許交易流程之間的互動。Therefore, to obtain the proper behavior you must understand the interaction between whether transaction flow is permitted by the binding and the property. 下表顯示可能的行為。The following table shows the possible behavior. |TransactionScopeRequiredTransactionScopeRequired|繫結程序允許異動流程Binding permits transaction flow|呼叫者流動交易Caller flows transaction|結果Result| |-|-|-|-| |FalseFalse|FalseFalse|否No|方法執行時不需交易。Method executes without a transaction.| |TrueTrue|FalseFalse|否No|方法建立新交易，並在其中執行。Method creates and executes within a new transaction.| |True 或 FalseTrue or False|FalseFalse|[是]Yes|傳回 SOAP 錯誤做為異動標頭。A SOAP fault is returned for the transaction header.| |FalseFalse|TrueTrue|[是]Yes|方法執行時不需異動。Method executes without a transaction.| |TrueTrue|TrueTrue|[是]Yes|方法執行於流動交易下。Method executes under the flowed transaction.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範在強制分散式交易中執行的作業。The following code example shows an operation that executes within a mandatory distributed transaction. 屬性會指出該作業會執行於交易範圍下，而 屬性會指出如果沒有發生未處理的例外狀況，該交易範圍便會自動完成。The property indicates that the operation executes under a transaction scope and the property indicates that if no unhandled exceptions occur, the transaction scope is completed automatically. 如果確實發生未處理的例外狀況，異動便會中止。If an unhandled exception does occur, the transaction is aborted. [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Transaction#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_transaction/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Transaction#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_transaction/vb/services.vb#2)]
